transactionID.description: Denotes transaction id for which reversal needs to be done

revertTransactionID.description: Denotes reverted transaction id for corresponding transaction id

amount.description: Amount for which reversal is required

currency.description: Currency for which reversal is required

accountHolderID.description: ID of the account holder for whom the account belongs

transactionPolicyIDs.description: ID of the transaction policies assosciated with the account

attributes.description: Any additional information which you would like to provide

relatedAccountID.description: ID of the related account ID

attributes.description: Any additional information which you would like to provide

currency.description: Currency for which reversal is required

amount.description: Amount for which reversal is required

doPartialReversal.description: Pass this as true or false for partial reversal of transaction

coaID.description: Code given to a transaction policy

code.description: Coa ID of issuer to which the transaction policy would be associated

transactionConstraints.description: Transaction Constraints containing allowed/disallowed transaction categories and time slices

transactionRules.description: Transaction rules to be applied on a particular posting

balanceRules.description: Balance rules to be applied either on transacting account or group of accounts of account holder based on applicability criteria and policy scope

aggregateRules.description: Aggregate rules (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly, yearly) to be applied based on applicability criteria and transaction category

effectiveFrom.description: Effective date from when the transaction policy will be applied

expiresAt.description: Expiry date for the transaction policy post which it will not be applied

createdAt.description: Creation date of the transaction policy

updatedAt.description: Last updated date of the transaction policy

attributes.description: Any additional information that you would like to associate with the transaction policy
Any additional information which you would like to provide

status.description: Status of the account to be changed
